jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Third-Party Platform team (internally is known as 3PP) mission is to build an open platform within Gojek app, enabling third-party developers to use Gojek technologies to grow their business and providing more product/use cases to Gojek users at the same time. Some of the products that we have built are GoNews, GoGive, GoMall, GoFitness and many others.

We are looking for a marketing lead that will craft the story for our products. If product and engineering drive the plot, you will be the one who delivers the narrative, and just like with the movies, you can’t have one without the other. In order to do so, you will need to keep a pulse on customer needs, the competitive landscape by directing qualitative and quantitative analysis. 

The ideal candidate has the ability to inspire cross-functional teams, story-tell with ease, and spearhead complex marketing programs.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Shape strategy, design programs and deliver on all marketing activities that support all Gojek third-party products
  • Identify learning opportunities, design research and synthesize learnings to help generate the latest insights on users
  • Manager program and product launches, go-to-market strategies and analyze project results
  • Drive innovation by supporting new product development and identify internal and external partnership opportunities to increase consumer product usage and engagements
  • Support executive communication within the Marketing organization and to cross-functional teams

• Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience
  • 5+ years of consumer marketing and strategy formulation experience in consumer goods, technology, or services
  • Experience leading cross-functional and external partner teams to develop strategic plans and implement initiatives
  • Experience in developing integrated marketing campaigns and independently leading cross-functional teams and agencies to deliver on plans
  • Ability to speak and write in English fluently and idiomatically
  • Demonstrated analytical success. Demonstrated capacity for developing strategy and delivering on goals
  • Interested in analyzing products, consumer insights, and market dynamics
  • Demonstrated capability of taking initiative, leadership roles, and breakthrough thinking and functioning in highly dynamic environments
